Why Open Source?
Open Source Contributions provide a way for me to gain beautiful learning experiences along the way, giving me a sense of accomplishment and the end of the day. I mean, that's all we want right? Sleeping at night with a feeling of accomplishment, like you have had a very productive day and worked very hard.
The experiences you get, the people you work with, the new projects you work on, which may be revolutionary at times, so contributing the best of your knowledge to that project for a fruitful result, is why I do what I do.
